- 2019.8 Published paper with Abhi Singh, Bulbul Chakraborty, Morton Denn, Jeff Morris on shear jamming and fragility: [Shear jamming and fragility in dense suspensions](https://doi.org/10.1007/s10035-019-0931-5)
- 2019.7 Published paper with [Romain Mari](https://rmari.github.io) on shear thickening order parameter: [Force transmission and the order parameter of shear thickening](http://dx.doi.org/10.1039/C9SM01223K) (https://arxiv.org/abs/1906.02103)
- 2020.03 Preprint about [rolling friction in suspension rheology](https://arxiv.org/abs/2002.10996). This work is done in collaboration with Abhinendra Singh (first author), Christopher Ness, Juan J de Pablo, and Heinrich M Jaeger!
